work-item.field:
Your personal homepage "My Polarion" gives you direct access to the configuration of your account. Only users, which belong to the global role "assignable" or to project role "project_assignable" are allowed to become an assignee for work items.

  • Open your personal homepage "My Polarion"
  • Click on "My account"
  • Check that you have role "project_assignable", "project_admin" and "project_approver" in your Polarion training project. If not please add the mentioned roles.
